creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: top center section of elaborate scroll and circle embroidery in red, green, white, yellow, blue; surrounded on top and sides by rows of embroidery and applied tape in same colors, and wide, 3-1/2" light green border; bottom section has two 6-1/2" prominent squares of embroidery in red, black, white, yellow and green surrounded by scroll embroidery in red, pink, black, green on white background; blue lining
title: Baby Carrier
